extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add from your Deck to your hand, 1 LIGHT Dragon-Type monster whose Level is less than or equal to the number of "Lightsworn" monsters with different names in your Graveyard. When this card is sent from your hand or Deck to the Graveyard: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard, then, if there is a "Lightsworn" monster among those cards, this card gains 200 ATK until your opponent's End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Raiden, Hand of the Lightsworn" once per turn. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having 4 or more "Lightsworn" monsters with different names in your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can pay 1000 Life Points; destroy all other cards on the field. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: This card gains 300 ATK and DEF for each "Lightsworn" monster with a different name in your Graveyard. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing Battle Damage to your opponent. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing a "Lightsworn" monster: You can send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard, then target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy those targets.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If this card attacks an opponent's monster, it gains 300 ATK during the Damage Step only. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; this card's battle position cannot be changed until the end of your next turn, also change this card you control from face-up Attack Position to face-up Defense Position, and if you do, destroy that target. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Each time a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by the effect of a "Lightsworn" monster you control, except "Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior": Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card for each "Lightsworn" monster sent to the Graveyard by this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Level 4 or lower "Lightsworn" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. When this card is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard: Special Summon it.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Before damage calculation, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster: Shuffle that monster into the Deck. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: "Lightsworn" monsters (everywhere) cannot be targeted by Spells, Traps, or card effects. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: "Lightsworn" monsters (everywhere) cannot be targeted by Spells, Traps, or card effects. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: FLIP: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy that target (if any), also, after that, send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: During your Main Phase: You can return this face-up card from the field to the hand. During the Damage Step, when a LIGHT monster you control battles (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY; that monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling, until the end of this turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having 5 or more LIGHT monsters with different names in your Graveyard. Once per turn: You can banish 1 LIGHT monster from your Graveyard to target 1 Set card your opponent controls; reveal that target, then return that target to either the top or bottom of the Deck.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having 4 or more LIGHT monsters in your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn: You can target 1 Field Spell Card and 2 other cards on the field; destroy them.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If this card is sent from the Monster Card Zone to the Graveyard: You can pay 500 Life Points, then target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target. If the equipped monster attacks or is attacked: It gains 1000 ATK during the Damage Step only.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Once per turn: You can discard any number of cards, and if you do, this card gains 1 Level and 400 ATK for each discarded card, until the End Phase.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When this card is discarded to the Graveyard, Special Summon it.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If this card is in your Graveyard: You can return 1 face-up card you control to the hand; Special Summon this card from the Graveyard, and if you do, take 400 damage. You can only use the effect of "Blackwing - Zephyros the Elite" once per Duel.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: During your opponent's turn: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; negate the next attack this turn from a monster your opponent controls (this is a Quick Effect).

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Lightsworn" monster from your hand to the Graveyard, then target 1 other "Lightsworn" monster in your Graveyard; add it to your hand. Each time a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard, place 1 Shine Counter on this card. If a "Lightsworn" card(s) you control would be destroyed by a card effect, you can remove 2 Shine Counters from your side of the field for each of those "Lightsworn" card(s) instead.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Each time a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard, place 1 Shine Counter on this card. All "Lightsworn" monsters gain 100 ATK for each Shine Counter. If this card would be destroyed by a card effect, remove 2 Shine Counters instead.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Discard 1 "Lightsworn" monster; draw 2 cards, then send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard; add 1 Level 4 or lower "Lightsworn" monster from your Deck to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Send 1 monster from your Deck to the Graveyard.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Target 1 "Lightsworn" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Attack Position. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target leaves the field, destroy this card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When a "Lightsworn" monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard, then target the attacking monster; negate the attack.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Tribute 1 "Lightsworn" monster. Negate the Summon of a monster and destroy it.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Discard your entire hand, then for each card you discarded to the Graveyard by this effect, add 1 LIGHT monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Target 1 face-up monster you control; it gains 400 ATK until the end of this turn. During your turn, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up monster you control; that target gains 800 ATK until the end of this turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Target 1 face-up Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate the effects of that opponent's face-up monster, until the end of this turn. During your turn, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 face-up Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate that target's effects until the end of this turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner LIGHT monsters

Once per turn: You can pay 1000 Life Points, then target 1 card on the field; banish that target. When this card is destroyed: You can target any number of other "Lightsworn" monsters in your Graveyard; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, you gain 300 Life Points for each returned card. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
